headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BENNETT, WILLIAM STEPHEN

lead_paragraph: BENNETT--William Stephen, of Bronxville, New York died on October 29, 2014. His family and many close friends will miss him deeply. A service will be held on November 6 at 4pm at the Episcopal Church of the Heavenly Rest in New York City. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Saltaire Volunteer Fire Co., Bay Shore, NY.
